name: Chegg
description: Chegg was an educational technology company that provided textbook rentals, homework help, and tutoring services. Its stock plummeted 48% in a single day after management cited ChatGPT as a direct threat to their business model.

name: Stack Overflow
description: Stack Overflow was the dominant Q&A platform for programmers worldwide. Traffic declined significantly as developers turned to AI coding assistants like GitHub Copilot and ChatGPT for immediate answers to programming questions.
